comments:
Build ID: I20070601-1539

Steps To Reproduce:
1. install 4.4.0 GA candidate build on Windows EM64T
2. configure ac for IBM jre 1.4.2 and start it
3. from a workbench try to launch and profile for execution
statistics (below uses the InOut test program from
/org.eclipse.tptp.ac.testautomation/automation-files/external_classes/InOut.class


More information:
The result is output to the console view:

JIT: Profiling support enabled
Start timestamp = Fri Jun 15 10:21:24 EDT 2007

Please enter a string : 
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.Error: java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException: Cp0
	at java.io.InputStreamReader.<init>(InputStreamReader.java:98)
	at InOut.main(InOut.java:38)
Caused by: java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException: Cp0
	at sun.io.Converters.getConverterClass(Converters.java:311)
	at sun.io.Converters.newConverter(Converters.java:344)
	at sun.io.ByteToCharConverter.getConverter(ByteToCharConverter.java:112)
	at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder$ConverterSD.<init>(StreamDecoder.java:263)
	at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder$ConverterSD.<init>(StreamDecoder.java:249)
	at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.forInputStreamReader(StreamDecoder.java:111)
	at java.io.InputStreamReader.<init>(InputStreamReader.java:93)
	at InOut.main(InOut.java:38)

This is using jre:
java version "1.4.2"Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 2.2)IBM J9SE VM (build 2.2, J2RE 1.4.2 IBM J9 2.2 Windows Server 2003 amd64-64 j9wa64142-20070317 (JIT enabled)J9VM - 20070228_2324_LEdSMrJIT  - r7_level20070211_2057)

Workbench is on Windows XP using IBM jre 1.5.

If I reconfigure the agent controller on the EM64T host
to use a Sun 1.4.2 jre the execution succeeds and no exception is produced.

If I run the application locally on the EM64T host from the command line 
using "-XrunpiAgent:server=enabled InOut" instead I can attach and
profile successfully from the workbench.
Hi Bing. I have transferred my bugs to you for triage. Thanks.
